dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S231 : Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Natural Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2013.
Section 2(c)(2) of the Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp Act of 2010 (39 U.S.C. 416 note) is amended by striking 2 years and inserting 6 years.
